Articles.Content: So I was playing scenario low orbit or whatever. While doing retrograde burn I accidently decoupled the capsule from the lander stage. I was able to EVA one of the kerbals out and land him on the moon. The other kerbals were gone. I was descending a little fast with the kerbal and he hit the moon at a high speed. He survived and eventually came to a stop on the surface. Right when I pressed a key for him to stand up however, the glitch happened.
that's weirdbut post it in the bugs forum

Someone can close this thread now.

Moved to support.
